column_description: Primary HMS LINCS compound ID, if available
Primary ChEMBL compound ID, if available
InChI chemical indentifier for the compound, standardized using https://molvs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/guide/standardize.html
SMILES chemical indentifier for the compound, standardized using https://molvs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/guide/standardize.html
Commercially available at a vendor in the ZINC database
Annotated as primary or secondary name at source
Organism for which gene is annotated
Target Affinity Spectrum (TAS). A number between 1 and 10 for the affinity between compound and target. 1 being most strongly binding.
Assertion for the selectivity of the compound to the given target.
Difference between ontarget and offtarget IC50 Q1 measurements
First quartile of ontarget IC50 measurements
First quartile of offtarget IC50 measurements
Remaining activity of target at the given compound concentration.
Ranking of compounds for the same target. First compound is best.
Compounds can be included either because of their selectivity or because they are approved/in clinical trials.
Weighted jaccard similarity between target affinity spectrum (TAS) vectors
Spearman correlation between phenotypic assay vectors
Affinity of compound to target (aggregated by taking first quartile)
Affinity of compound off-targets (aggregated by taking first quartile)
Value of measurement used for TAS assertion
Unit of measurement used for TAS assertion
Type of measurement used for TAS assertion
